title: Bought Sejuani twice, lost BE twice, still didnt get champion
body:
http://prntscr.com/hagye7 Screenshot of the store.
http://prntscr.com/hagz3h Screenshot that i bought Sejuani twice, and lost 9600 hard gained blue essence. I just want my essence back please :)

replies.body:
Sejuani was correctly added into your collection the first time, pretty weird that the store let you buy her again O_O.

No worries, I've got that second purchase refunded and you should have that 4800 BE back for ya ^_^!
